rideDetails.title: Coimbatore to Kodaikanal Ride

highlights.title: Safety Meets Brotherhood
highlights.description: Pre-ride safety briefings, skilled marshals, and a seamless support team ensured a smooth and safe journey.

highlights.title: The Roadside Revelries
highlights.description: Every pit stop was a celebration with filter coffee, spicy snacks, and moments of camaraderie.

highlights.title: Kodaikanal: The Crown Jewel
highlights.description: The riders were greeted with crisp mountain air, breathtaking views, and an evening bonfire that brought everyone together.

specialFeatures.title: Wuerth India’s Workshop on Wheels
specialFeatures.description: An interactive bike maintenance session with exclusive goodies like chain lubes and cleaning kits.

specialFeatures.title: Coolnut’s Portable Power Stations
specialFeatures.description: Ensured that all devices stayed charged, enabling GPS navigation and memory capturing.

specialFeatures.title: Wanderlooms Biker Gear
specialFeatures.description: Riders sported stylish custom jerseys and biker swag, blending style with adventure.

sponsors.name: Coolnut
sponsors.role: Portable power stations for charging devices

rideDetails.summary: This ride was a perfect blend of adventure, safety, and camaraderie, creating unforgettable memories for all participants.

rideDetails.title: Throttle Tales: Chennai to Vattavada with RC Chennai Chapter

highlights.title: Safety and Camaraderie
highlights.description: Pre-ride briefings, ride marshals, and a well-coordinated support crew ensured a smooth and enjoyable journey.

highlights.title: Pit Stops of Joy
highlights.description: Curated stops offered local delicacies, scenic photo opportunities, and bonding sessions.

highlights.title: The Vattavada Experience
highlights.description: Riders were welcomed by mist-clad hills, cardamom plantations, and an evening bonfire that fostered community.

specialFeatures.title: Wuerth India’s Maintenance Workshop
specialFeatures.description: Hands-on bike maintenance workshop with exclusive Wuerth goodies for riders.

specialFeatures.title: Coolnut’s Power Packs
specialFeatures.description: Portable power stations ensured devices stayed charged even in remote areas.

specialFeatures.title: Wanderlooms Merchandise
specialFeatures.description: Stylish custom jerseys and accessories added a touch of biker swag to the adventure.

rideDetails.summary: The Chennai to Vattavada ride was a celebration of the biking spirit, blending thrill, safety, and fellowship into an unforgettable journey.
